<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>true</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_x_wdtpa_fos_work_b_hdf_work_being_performed_calendars</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>HDF Insert Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_58872_needit_x_wdtpa_fos_work_b_hdf_work_being_performed_calendars');
	gr.newRecord();

	gr.hdf_wbp_u_source = 'aeed229047801200e0ef563dbb9a71c2';
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_title = 'Test 01';
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_status = 'pending_approval';
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_start_date = current.hdf_wbp_u_start_date;
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_end_date = current.hdf_wbp_u_end_date;


	var startDateTime = new GlideDateTime(gr.hdf_wbp_u_start_date);
	var convertedStartDateTime = new global.hdf_wbp_datetime_convert_helper();
	var finalResultStartDateTime = convertedStartDateTime.convertDateTimeToSpecificTimeZone(startDateTime, 'US/Eastern');
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_converted_start_date = finalResultStartDateTime;
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_work_start_datetime = finalResultStartDateTime;


	var endDateTime = new GlideDateTime(gr.hdf_wbp_u_end_date);
	var convertedEndDateTime = new global.hdf_wbp_datetime_convert_helper();
	var finalResultEndDateTime = convertedEndDateTime.convertDateTimeToSpecificTimeZone(endDateTime, 'US/Eastern');
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_converted_end_date = finalResultEndDateTime;
	gr.hdf_wbp_u_work_end_datetime = finalResultEndDateTime;



	gr.insert();


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-17 18:24:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3f420851b133010b0935464604bcbf0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HDF Insert Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c3f420851b133010b0935464604bcbf0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-17 19:07:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c3f420851b133010b0935464604bcbf0"/></record_update>
